original_text: So the people returned to Ziph before Saul himself went there. David and his men were in the Maon Desert. This was south of Jeshimon, in the Jordan Valley.
korean_text: 그들이 일어나 사울보다 먼저 십으로 가니라 다윗과 그의 사람들이 광야 남쪽 마온 광야 아라바에 있더니

sentences.original_text: So the people returned to Ziph
David and his men were in the Maon Desert
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 마온 광야에 있었고
